description:
Speed through stunning 3D tracks you created  and discover the magic of Trax!
Build fast, fun and challenging tracks with the track builder.

CREATE CLASSIC TRACKS
Mix it up with your own track designs. Choose pieces of track and assemble new and exciting circuits or pick one from the twelve included pre-built World race tracks. 

RACE YOUR FRIENDS OR A DIGITAL FOE

Play against your friends or play against the smart artificial intelligence (AI) player, either way, winning won’t come easy. 

THE CAR’S THE STAR
Choose from four classic cars, then customise your ride.

CHOOSE YOUR VIEW
Adjust your point-of-view mid-game to get the best view of the action.
name: Trax - Build it Race it
